ORG_0000058 - spin-off process

Label

spin-off process

Definition

The process by which one organization spins off of another

Definition source

Michael Conlon https://orcid.org/0000-0002-1304-8447

Example

Google is the output of a spin-off process in which Stanford University was a participant

Term editor

Michael Conlon https://orcid.org/0000-0002-1304-8447
